episodes.title: Flight of the Phoenix
episodes.plot: Michael says goodbye to the family business and starts his own. The life of the family turns upside down when their mailman Pete dies.

episodes.title: Borderline Personalities
episodes.plot: George Sr. comes up with a get-rich-quick scam after his family falls apart.

episodes.title: Indian Takers
episodes.plot: Lindsay tries to reclaim her sense of self while traveling and getting back to her political activist roots.

episodes.title: The B. Team
episodes.plot: As Michael's career as a 'Co-Producer' unfolds, he needs his family to sign off the rights to use them in his upcoming film.

episodes.title: A New Start
episodes.plot: Tobias searches for meaning after splitting with Lindsay, only to find that old habits die hard.

episodes.title: Double Crossers
episodes.plot: George Sr.'s new business hits a rough patch, and he must bribe a politician to get his scam back on track.

episodes.title: Colony Collapse
episodes.plot: Gob finds a new group of friends after his relationship falls apart and his family abandons him.

episodes.title: Red Hairing
episodes.plot: Lindsay distances herself from her family by starting a new career.

episodes.title: Smashed
episodes.plot: Tobias attempts to recover from a series of bad choices by reigniting his passion: both professionally and romantically.

episodes.title: Queen B.
episodes.plot: Lucille adjusts to her new home only to find out her children are divvying up her old one.

episodes.title: A New Attitude
episodes.plot: Gob accepts a job from his brother, but is distracted by a scheme of his own.

episodes.title: Señoritis
episodes.plot: As Maeby's life spirals out of control, she moves out on her own ending up coming into contact with her cousin, George-Michael.

episodes.title: It Gets Better
episodes.plot: George-Michael whilst trying to reconnect with his father, finds himself overwhelmed by the responsibility of running his business, Fakeblock.

episodes.title: Off the Hook
episodes.plot: Buster tries to make it on his own without his over-bearing mother, but finds it quite difficult.

episodes.title: Blockheads
episodes.plot: George-Michael moves to Sudden Valley in an idyllic secluded neighborhood, where unusually friendly and grabby men and an occasional woman live to avoid contact with children. Rebel's relationship with the two Michaels complicates.
